## About This Project

The Research Notes Hub serves as a centralized repository for our research team's weekly meeting notes, methodological discussions, and project documentation. This site is designed to:

- **Document Progress**: Track weekly research activities and decisions
- **Maintain Transparency**: Keep all team members informed of ongoing work
- **Preserve Institutional Knowledge**: Create a searchable archive of methods, findings, and challenges
- **Facilitate Collaboration**: Provide easy access to shared resources and outputs

## Site Features

This Quarto-based website includes:

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}
### Navigation

- **Left Sidebar**: Table of contents for easy navigation within pages
- **Top Navbar**: Quick access to main sections and search
- **Search Functionality**: Full-text search across all pages
:::

::: {.callout-tip appearance="simple"}
### Content Organization

- **Collapsible Summaries**: Click to expand meeting summaries
- **Tabbed Sections**: Toggle between related content (e.g., All Counties vs. Restricted Sample)
- **Figure Reference Table**: Quick lookup for key outputs
:::

## Contact

For questions about this research hub or to request access to resources, please contact the project team.

## Technical Details

This site is built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and hosted on GitHub Pages. The theme uses Bootstrap's Flatly for a clean, professional appearance suitable for academic and business contexts.
